Megatron Revived/ Sweeps:
 
Megatron looked at Hydras and his subordanent.  
'Interesting title,' he thought as more Sweeps came raining down.
"You cannot win against Unicron," one said, shortly before being blasted.
"He was beaten one, he will be beaten again," the Emperor clone said, before anchoring himself to the ground.  The barrel of his Focus Mega Particle Fusion Cannon pointed to the skies.  
"35%...40%... 45%... 50% of maximum power," the computer said as the fusion weapon reached half strength.
"Let's see your faith defeat this!" Megatron shouted, as the massive weapon began to draw power from the surrounding.  The sky seemed to darken, the Sweeps drew away and back to the air.  The it fired.  A massive torrent of fused anti matter filled the sky, Sweeps caught in the attack were vaporized, others had parts of there body were melted away.  The bodies and parts of Sweeps began to rain down, as Megatron stood, admiring his handywork.

CatMaster o <CatMastero@...> wrote:
Quickstrike ran through the battle field avoiding all the shots while
he blasted down sweeps.  Though as he approached the cannon he saw
it's shields were already under attack. 
"No good." He fired a beam of cyber venom at BlackNightmare.
"'fraid I can't let ya do that."


Waspinator flew in his beast mode through the air avoiding beams from
the sweeps as he grabbed the missile that he had hidden earlier. He
lifted it and then looked for a important looking enemy. Spotting
Darkfate he flew in for the attack dropping the missile from above and
converted to robot mode after he released it.
"Hehe. This time Waspinator blow enemy up!" the bug exclaimed with
excitement.


"Eyaa!" Inferno yelled as he burned his way through some sweeps.
Though he saw Hydras becoming over run with sweeps. He charged towards
him but was delayed even more sweeps.  He saw that a bot he didn't
recognize reached Hydras first.  
"Royalty!" He helped and blasted what few sweeps that the other left
behind.
"My queen, the cannon itself is under attack!" he replayed to Hydras.


Elsewhere Kenzo had ducked behind a big rock and fired his finger
laser at sweeps since that was the only real weapon he had. 
"How many of these creepy things are there?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare/Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> 
> "INJUSTICE CAN YA DESTROY THAT LITTLE GIRL!!!! WE NEED WORK!"said 
> the femme while she continue attaking the cannon
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Organics/ Wolfblade/ Malice/ Injustice:
> >  
> > Hellplague veered to one side to narrowly avoid Rodimus' counter 
> attack.  She landed and skidded to a stop and levelled her 
> disruptors at Rodimus.
> > "Looks like it's you and me," she said, grinning devilishly.
> >  
> > Organics charged over to the cannon site and decided to square off 
> with Blacknightmare.
> > "Okay, where's Malice?  We want him back!" the valkyrie said, 
> tightening the grip on her sword.
> >  
> > Wolfblade ducked under the larger bots in her way and made her way 
> to the cannon.  The she saw two bots trying to tear it up.  She 
> fired a shot close to one, and both stopped what hey were doing and 
> stepped into full view.  
> >  
> > It was Malice, and a bot who looked a whole lot like him.  
> Wolfblade lowered her rifle, she only stared at Malice, who did 
> nothing.  
> > "Malice..." the femme said taking a step toward him.
> > Malice said nothing, he did not recognize this litle femme, why 
> did she look at him like that.  
> > "Do I know you, miss?" The Hunter Killer asked, flexing his claws.
> > "Malice, don't you recognize me?  It's me, Wolfblade.  Come on, 
> quit messing around, let's go back to base, we'll fix whatever they 
> did to you.  Comeback with me," the femme said, extending a hand out 
> to Malice.
> > Injustice began to crack up.  This was absurd, Malice was a 
> Minion, right?
> > "Go play somewhere else, little gil, we'e busy," the clone said, 
> smirking.
> > "YOU SHUT UP!  I DON'T REMEMBER ASKING YOU, YOU FREAK!" Wolfblade 
> snapped, loud enough for anyone to hear.
> > Malice, meanwhile, was secretly deep in his own conflict.  Who was 
> she really?  she semed like she knew him very well, and somehow, she 
> seemed familiar somehow, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.
> >  
> > Did he?
> > 
> > Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: Well Rattrap, try to spot any generals among the 
> Sweeps. If you do spot them, thake em' out!
> > 
> > Rodimus the notices Hellplague diveing at him. Rodimus reaches 
> upwards to grab Hellplague, attempting a bodyslam.
> > 
> > 
> > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > OOC:  Sorry, got a little ahead of myself.
> > 
> > Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Malice/ 
> Injustice/ 
> > Necross/ Splattercannon:
> > 
> > Hellplague reeled back as Rodimus returned fire.  He armor bore 
> the 
> > brunt of the damage, but it slowed her down for a minute before 
> she 
> > dived down to engage Rodimus in one on one combat.  
> > "Blacknightmare!  They're a little thick here!  Time for that back 
> > up!" the Sweep commander called into her comm link.
> > 
> > Organics and wolfblade were more or less holding their own with 
> the 
> > Sweeps.  Wolfblade was able to keep ahead of the larger bots and 
> > blast holes in them.  Organics was flying circles around the 
> Sweeps, 
> > but they kept coming.
> > 
> > Megatron dashed toward a group of Sweeps that had congregated 
> around 
> > Hydras.  The clone drew his massive sword and charged into the 
> melee, 
> > each swing of his sword fell several of Unicron's footsoldiers.  
> He 
> > made his way close enough to ask the Predacon leader a question:
> > "Are you well enough to fight?"
> > 
> > "Let's go!  They need us now!" Malice said as he hung on to 
> > Blacknightmare.
> > "Yeah, I want a piece of the action too!" Injustice exclaimed, 
> > wiggling in Nightstrike's grip.
> > Necross remained in his robot form, silent through the whole 
> ordeal.  
> > Splattercannon too, remained silent, but wanted to go in and shot 
> > some Maximals full of holes.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > OOC: I'll let it go this time, but unless the rules changed in 
> my 
> > absence, posting for damage to anothers char is considered moding 
> > here. You cannot post any kind of control of anothers char without 
> > their consent.
> > >  
> > > : : Rodimus 
> Prime/Kup/Darkangel/DeathStar/SharpClaws/Wolfenstein : :
> > > 
> > > Rodimus spins around after the disruptor blast strike his 
> shoulder, 
> > blowing part of his armor off.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus: Damn, gettinf careless, Roddy.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus draws his plasma rifle from subspace and locates 
> > Hellplague. He returns fire with three shots.
> > > 
> > > Kup is situated behind a large boulder. He takes careful aim, 
> > fireing shot after shot at Sweeps.
> > > 
> > > Darkangel has flown into the air and drawn his swords.
> > > He dives by Sweeps at quick speeds, slashing with his swords, 
> > taking many out.
> > >  
> > > In star-fighter mode, DeathStar engages several Sweeps in a 
> > dogfight.
> > >  
> > > SharpClaw unleashes his claws and stands ready on the battle 
> field.
> > >  
> > > SharpClaws: Ok you Unicron spawns, come down here and fight!
> > >  
> > > Wolfensten is launching his grappling hook and different Sweeps. 
> > Once it attaches to one, he pulls them down causing them to crash.
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague:
> > > 
> > > Wolfblade stayed near Rodimus, picking off Sweeps one by one 
> with 
> > her 
> > > railgun.  Organics was in the air, slicing and dicing Sweeps 
> with 
> > her 
> > > sword.  She also launched volleys of Lancet energy missiles, 
> into 
> > > groups to help take them out.
> > > 
> > > Hellplague looked around and found her target, Rodimus Prime.  
> She 
> > > took careful aim, and waited, then fired when he wasn't 
> expecting 
> > > it.  The disruptor blasts streaked toward him, striking him in 
> the 
> > > shoulder.  
> > > 
> > > Megatron waited, patiently, then saw his opperunity.  He jumped 
> > into 
> > > the air, locked on, and fired a 35% shot from his fusion 
> cannon.  
> > The 
> > > blast streaked through the sky, taking a huge swath from the 
> Sweep 
> > > swarm over head.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus jumps to the side, rolling back to his feet as the 
> enemy 
> > > fire starts.
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus: Its begun. Take them out!
> > > > 
> > > > Rodimus locks onto some above Sweeps and fires with his 
> > > wrist/exaust pipe laser blasters.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Sweeps:
> > > > 
> > > > Organics landed near odimus and Hydras, setting Wolfblade 
> down.  
> > > > Wolfblade drew her railgun(ooc: I'm assuming that is her 
> weapon 
> > > since 
> > > > she has never used it), and Organics drew her shield and sword.
> > > > "We're ready, Rodimus," Wolfblade said, slinging her rifle 
> over 
> > her 
> > > > shoulder.
> > > > 
> > > > ~*~
> > > > 
> > > > Megatron Revived slowed and transformed back into robot mode.  
> He 
> > > > knew his presense would cause trouble.  He remained out of 
> sight, 
> > > his 
> > > > sophisticated sensors tracking everyone's every move.  He also 
> > > > tracked the Minions on their approach.  
> > > > 
> > > > ~*~
> > > > 
> > > > Hellplague transformed into her robot form and signalled one 
> wave 
> > > of 
> > > > Sweeps into battle.  They all transformed and rained down on 
> the 
> > > > cannon site, targeting everything in sight.  Hellplague 
> laughed, 
> > > then 
> > > > started looking for Rodimus Prime.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus chuckled.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus: So much for the motivasional speaking. For those of 
> > you 
> > > > who dont get motovated by things like that... TURN THEM INTO 
> SLAG!
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Hydras::�
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > "You should forget the speech, prime"hissed Hydras"or do you 
> > > expect 
> > > > > wind agaisnt Unicron's slaves with words?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Rodimus 
> > > > > Prime/Kup/Darkangel/DeathStar/SharpClaws/Wolfenstein : :
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > The two Predacons, two Tripredacus and two Autobots all 
> > arrive 
> > > at 
> > > > > the cannon site. Rodimus arrives last of the six.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rodimus: Rodimus Prime TRANSFORM!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He launches into the air, changing to bot mode. The others 
> > > follow.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > First Rodimus messes with some controls on the incomplete 
> > > cannon. 
> > > > > A force field is erected over it soon after.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rodimus stands in the center of the battlefield, looking 
> > around.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Speach time," he thinks.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime: You all know what is at stake here. Our 
> > > > possibility 
> > > > > for survival. This cannon may be our only defense against 
> the 
> > > chaos 
> > > > > bringer, Unicron. We cannot aford to lose it. I'm sure this 
> > > battle 
> > > > > will be fierce but it is also the most importent battle any 
> of 
> > us 
> > > > > have fought in a long time. I want you all to look around 
> you 
> > and 
> > > > > notice how importent this moment will be in Cybertronian 
> > history. 
> > > > On 
> > > > > this ground Autobots, Maximals, Decepticons, Predacons and 
> > > > > Tripredacus are all united for the first time in one comon 
> > > effort. 
> > > > > We do not fight to destroy each other but to insure all of 
> our 
> > > > > survival. Autobots, Decepticons and otherwise, these are 
> mere 
> > > > terms. 
> > > > > We are TRANSFORMERS, a warrior race!!!!!!!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Prime draws his weapons as do the others. The ultimate 
> battle 
> > > is 
> > > > > coming. A battle of all Transformers.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Hydras:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Do you have a strategy old friend?" hissed sarcastically 
> > > hydras 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > Rodimus
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Finally Rodimus made his way outside the base. He 
> > transformes 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > his sports car mode and heads for the cannon at top speeds.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > CatMaster o <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > 'This sounds bad' Kenzo thought.  He was a bit worried 
> > about 
> > > > what
> > > > > > > Unicron might unleash.  He exited the Maximal base and 
> took 
> > a 
> > > > > > glance
> > > > > > > towards the sky before transforming to his helochopter 
> form 
> > > and 
> > > > > > taking
> > > > > > > flight to the cannon construction site.
